com.bitctrl.resource

Interface WritableConfiguration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReadOnlyConfiguration
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TreeProperties

    public interface WritableConfiguration
extends ReadOnlyConfiguration
    Schnittstelle für eine Konfiguration, die lesbar und schreibbar ist.
    Author:
    BitCtrl Systems GmbH, Falko Schumann

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.bitctrl.resource.ReadOnlyConfiguration
